name: Arcade Royale
description:
Controls are set up for ESNE's arcade machine, I'll release a more keyboard-friendly build in the future.

Player 1

  • Move Cursor: WASD
  • Select/Confirm Unit: U
  • Previous/Next Unit: A/D
  • Place Unit: J

Player 2

  • Move Cursor: arrow keys
  • Select/Confirm Unit: Insert
  • Previous/Next Unit: left arrow/right arrow
  • Place Unit: Delete
